column5: Walked the Rouge on Saturday near the Milne Dam. Water still murky and only saw one cluster of trout. Maybe 15 or so just hanging around. Didn't see any suckers.
I had a walk with the family along Duffin creek on Saturday in Greenwood Park. Didn't see one fish. Not sure where the fish are. Come and gone ? have not come up yet ?
Come and gone in most tribs, They have been running all winter ?

That's my hood. I'm on Robinson creek, a rouge tributary near Milne. The trout were stacked up a week ago, but not many there now, and they'll be long gone by opener. I try every year and they're always gone by opener.
Been catching spawned-out fish off the Bronte pier since March break. Even that's slowing down now, starting to see more carp than anything else.
